div.head: 損瘀
div.div: blood that has left the vessels following an injury

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: blood that has left the vessels following an injury

sense.def: Pathological Product of blood that has left the vessels (hematom

a) following a bodily injury. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry bai pu xi 敗蒲席：從高墜下， 損瘀在腹刺痛，此蒲合臥破敗者良 , “For [treating persons who] having fallen from somewhere high and [now] have blood that has left the vessels following an injury with piercing pain. Those mats that have been worn out by [people] sleeping on them are best”.
